profile.name: Sarah XXXX
profile.title: Tech lead data fullstack GO / C# / ReactJS
profile.description: With 15 years of experience, including 7 years as CTO and main craftsman of Datasweet, I acquired a global vision of the software developer profession. Unifying, versatile, autonomous and rigorous, I will bring you the keys to succeed in the development of your projects.

Create analytics dashboards with Kibana
